summary: Provides a compatibility layer that converts OpenAI‑style chat completion payloads into the format required by Perplexity’s `/v1/chat/completions` endpoint, using a dedicated configuration class to manage provider settings and secrets.
business_intent: Allow developers to interact with Perplexity’s chat model through the familiar OpenAI API schema, simplifying integration and enabling unified handling of multiple LLM providers within the Litellm framework.
